items.question: What video quality can I record in?
items.answer: You can record in up to 1080p quality with the option to adjust settings based on your needs. This ensures clear visuals and high-quality audio for any type of recording.

items.question: Can I include my voice or other audio in the recording?
items.answer: Yes! You have the ability to choose audio sources, including microphone input alongside system audio, allowing for thorough and engaging presentations.

items.question: Is it easy to share the recordings?
items.answer: Absolutely! After recording, you can easily download your videos, or share straight to social media and other platforms without hassle.

items.question: Can I record multiple times without losing quality?
items.answer: Yes! You can make as many recordings as you need, each time maintaining the highest quality output without degradation.

items.question: What is the pricing model for using the screen recorder?
items.answer: We operate on a pay-as-you-go pricing model, ensuring you only pay for the recordings you create without any hidden fees or subscriptions.

items.question: How long does it take to start recording?
items.answer: Getting started is instantaneous! With just one click, you can begin capturing your screen within seconds.

items.question: What are the best use cases for screen recording?
items.answer: Screen recording is perfect for educational purposes, product demonstrations, real-time support, marketing videos, and much more!

items.question: Do I own the rights to the videos I record?
items.answer: Yes! All videos created are yours with full commercial rights, allowing for usage across various platforms without additional charges.

items.question: What support is available if I have issues?
items.answer: We provide extensive support including detailed documentation, video tutorials, and a responsive support team ready to assist with any technical questions.
